CustomField.formula: IF( Progress_Percentage__c <= 20 && Progress_Percentage__c > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0159000000Edwkr", "Warming Up"), IF( Progress_Percentage__c <= 40 && Progress_Percentage__c > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0159000000Edwks", "In Progress"), IF( Progress_Percentage__c <= 60 && Progress_Percentage__c > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0159000000Edwkt", "Half Way"), IF( Progress_Percentage__c <= 99&& Progress_Percentage__c > 0, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0159000000Edwku", "Almost There"), IF( Progress_Percentage__c = 100, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0159000000Edwkv", "Done"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0159000000Edwkw", "Not Applicable"))))))
CustomField.label: Progress Bar
